io.barracks.ota.client

Class PackageDownloadService

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • android.app.IntentService
            • io.barracks.ota.client.PackageDownloadService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2

    public class PackageDownloadService
extends android.app.IntentService
    This service is used to handle the download of a package in the background.
    It uses the LocalBroadcastManager to send updates of the download, using the categories for success, progress and failure for a specific action
    See Also:
    BarracksHelper

    • Method Detail

      • onHandleIntent

        protected void onHandleIntent(android.content.Intent intent)
        Specified by:
        onHandleIntent in class android.app.IntentService

      • setupFile

        protected boolean setupFile(File file)
        Prepares a file for a download : deletes it, creates the parent directories.
        Parameters:
        file - The file to be prepared.
        Returns:
        True if the file has been successfully prepared, false otherwise.

      • checkPackageIntegrity

        protected void checkPackageIntegrity(UpdateDetails details,
                                     File file)
                              throws IOException,
                                     GeneralSecurityException
        This method checks the package's file integrity.
        It uses the md5 provided in the details parameter.
        Parameters:
        details - The UpdateDetails retrieved from the Barracks platform.
        file - The file which was downloaded.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception is raised while accessing the file.
        GeneralSecurityException - If the hash verification fails.

      • moveToFinalDestination

        protected void moveToFinalDestination(File temporary,
                                      File destination)
                               throws IOException
        This method moves the temporary file to its destination.
        If the file can't be moved, the method tries to copy it.
        Parameters:
        temporary - The temporary file.
        destination - The destination file.
        Throws:
        IOException - If an exception occurs during the copy phase.

        public android.os.IBinder onBind(android.content.Intent intent)

        onBind in class android.app.IntentService
